abstract: Dow Jones industrial average gains 166.36 points, or 1.45 percent, to 11,644.49; Standard and Poor's 500-stock index rises 20.92 points, or 1.74 percent, to 1,224.58; Nasdaq composite index gains 47.61 points, or 1.82 percent, to 2,667.85.
snippet: Stocks rose after a report showed sales jumped in September, beating expectations.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose after a report showed sales jumped in September, beating expectations.

headline.main: Dow Returns to Positive Territory for Year
headline.print_headline: Dow Returns to Positive Territory for Year
headline.seo: Strong Retail Sales Numbers Push Shares Higher
